windowsAuthentication.description: Set to true to enable windows authentication for your site in IIS and IIS Express.

anonymousAuthentication.description: Set to true to enable anonymous authentication for your site in IIS and IIS Express.

iisExpress.description: Site settings to use with IISExpress profiles.

iis.description: Site settings to use with IIS profiles.

applicationUrl.description: The URL of the web site.

sslPort.description: The SSL port to use for the web site.

commandName.description: Identifies the debug target to run.

commandLineArgs.description: The arguments to pass to the target being run.

executablePath.description: An absolute or relative path to the executable.

workingDirectory.description: Sets the working directory of the command.

launchBrowser.description: Set to true if the browser should be launched.

launchUrl.description: The relative URL to launch in the browser.

environmentVariables.description: Set the environment variables as key/value pairs.

applicationUrl.description: A semi-colon delimited list of URL(s) to configure for the web server.

nativeDebugging.description: Set to true to enable native code debugging.

externalUrlConfiguration.description: Set to true to disable configuration of the site when running the Asp.Net Core Project profile.

use64Bit.description: Set to true to run the 64 bit version of IIS Express, false to run the x86 version.

ancmHostingModel.description: Specifies the hosting model to use when running ASP.NET core projects in IIS and IIS Express.

sqlDebugging.description: Set to true to enable debugging of SQL scripts and stored procedures.

jsWebView2Debugging.description: Set to true to enable the JavaScript debugger for Microsoft Edge (Chromium) based WebView2.

leaveRunningOnClose.description: Set to true to leave the IIS application pool running when the project is closed.

remoteDebugEnabled.description: Set to true to have the debugger attach to a process on a remote computer.

remoteDebugMachine.description: The name and port number of the remote machine in name:port format.

authenticationMode.description: The authentication scheme to use when connecting to the remote computer.

hotReloadEnabled.description: Set to true to enable applying code changes to the running application.

publishAllPorts.description: Publish all exposed ports to random ports in Docker (-P).

useSSL.description: Set to true to bind the SSL port.

sslPort.description: The SSL port to use for the web site.

httpPort.description: The HTTP port to use for the web site.

dotnetRunMessages.description: Set to true to display a message when the project is building.

inspectUri.description: The url to enable debugging on a Blazor WebAssembly application.

targetProject.description: A relative ot absolute path to the .NET project file on which Roslyn component should be executed. Relative to the current project's folder.

schema.title: JSON schema for the Visual Studio LaunchSettings.json file.
